pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel

Class SingleImageWithStateCellRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel.CellRepresentation
      • pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel.ImageCellRepresentation
        • pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel.SingleImageCellRepresentation
          • pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel.SingleImageWithStateCellRepresentation

  • public class SingleImageWithStateCellRepresentation
extends SingleImageCellRepresentation
    Draws a single image as a Cell Representation, allowing it to be enabled or disabled. By default, when this representation is disabled, the original image is drawn in grayscale.
    Author:
    mpmf
